post.body: Hmmmm, a bunch of stuff. Games for the Wii, a cappuccino maker, clothes, etc. You?
Agh so tired. Gran Torino is an f-ing awesome movie, btw.
Come on, MU, let's update those dean's and grad lists.
http://twitpic.com/ze6j - Waffles: Day 2. So good.
Finally got a hold of Steph! I'm so excited to hang out with two of my best friends in the whole world tonight!
The people behind my house are without a doubt blowing up a small chunk of the earth right now. Happy New Year!
This is so cool, how did I not know about this? http://www.friendsorenemies.com/web/foe/journals/itsnotjustafad/entry/3478421
The internet Mariokart tournament has begun! Hit me up at 3910-1896-8217 if you want to join!
Tentative Wii online Mariokart party between me, my sister, her friends, and my sister-in-law tonight. We're totally lame, hah.
Super random, but I really want to play some old school Sim City.
Cutest couple ever! http://tinyurl.com/87kekr
Worked up quite a sweat playing Rock Band. Jeeze.
It is raining like crazy here in Illinois. Heard you Missourians had tornadoes today too. I think the world is ending.
My mom is reading the instructions for my new cappuccino maker and getting angry, haha. "What the hell is the pressure valve?!"
Best Christmas ever, for realz. Minus that year I got the Polly Pocket mansion when I was like 5, because that was pretty rad.
Sleep now. Merry Christmas!
Hitting up Alfies for Christmas Eve dinner, heck yes. Then drinks and presents at my sister's house.
Just went out to do some more Christmas shopping. The weather here sucks, but at least it's really pretty out.
It is -3 degrees in Chicago right now. Yikes.
Just saw The Day the Earth Stood Still with Nick. Oh so terrible.
